price: And he made it[9] a lasting word among his descendants, so that they may return [to Allah].
arabic: وَجَعَلَهَا كَلِمَةَۢ بَاقِيَةٗ فِي عَقِبِهِۦ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ
footnotes: [9] i.e., his testimony of faith that none has the right to be worshiped except Allah.
